data.title: Cheryl Fernandez-Versini named TV celebrity with best hair of 2014
data.meta_description: Cheryl Fernandez-Versini has been named the TV celebrity with the best hair of 2014.
data.text:
Cheryl Fernandez-Versini has been named the TV celebrity with the best hair of 2014. The 31-year-old took the top spot closely followed by Jacqueline Jossa and Michelle Keegan respectively, in a poll by Hairtrade.com.

Scroll below for the full list of winners

Cheryl Fernandez-Versini has topped a poll for TV celebrity with best hair

It's been an exciting return to the small screen for Cheryl, who was welcomed back to the X Factor judging panel this year alongside Simon Cowell, Mel B and Louis Walsh.

Since then, fans have praised her chic hairstyles on a weekly basis as she continues to up the style stakes throughout the talent contest.

Offscreen it's been a successful year for Cheryl, who made history with more number one singles than any other female solo artist, alongside an exciting turn in her personal life when she married Jean Bernard Fernandez-Versini in July.

The X Factor judge's voluminous brunette locks saw her take 24 per cent of the votes in the poll, while Eastenders actress and mum-to-be Jacqueline took second place with 18 per cent.

Jacqueline Jossa took second place in the poll

Former Coronation Street star Michelle took the third spot with her dark brown locks, which she often wears down in loose waves, with 16 per cent.

Other celebrities featuring on the list included blonde beauties Holly Willoughby and Fearne Cotton, as well as Made in Chelsea stars Lucy Watson and Binky Felstead and Strictly Come Dancing contestant. Pixie Lott.
